title: KITCHEN NEEDS 12 In 1 Multifunctional Manual Vegetable Slicer, Veggie Cutter, Very Sharp blades, Gray
features: Save Time- You no longer have to slice things using a knife. This is a great tool to help you slice them in less time, and it will prevent you from getting hurt as well. It will take you 10 times less time to cut fruits/vegetables than using a knife. Before you even prepare your knife and your cutting board, you will already be halfway through cutting your fruits/vegetables using KITCHEN NEEDS Slicer.

High Quality- KITCHEN NEEDS Slicer is made from high-quality materials. It has higher quality than any other competitors in the market. It is made by using long-lasting and durable materials. It makes you feel you are using a luxury kit.

Sharp Blades- Blades are very sharp, and they will help you to slice things easier and faster. It is very sharp it can cut almost any type of fruit and vegetable. It has many sharp blades that you can use to cut your vegetables/fruits. And they are in different sizes to help you cut in the size you want.

No Mess/Cleaning issues- When you use KITCHEN NEEDS Slicer it is very easy to clean it up. When you use a knife and a cutting board you will have to make a mess and you will have to clean it up, but using this slicer you will no longer have to deal with the mess and it is very easy to clean up.

Easy To Use- KITCHEN NEEDS Slicer is very easy to use, helping you to complete your task very easily. Our mission is to help you save time and use that time on other things in life. And help you guys save time to use that saved to complete your other tasks in life. We appreciate your business with us, and thanks for choosing KITCHEN NEEDS. Thank you for your interest!
